DOC.brief_summary: Background : How best improve iron status among infant low-income setting continue concern many country , include Brazil Objective : Design : In double blind , 5-mo , home-based trial Brazil , mildly anemic 6 - 24 month-old child ( n=175 ) randomly assign receive either Ultra Rice ( URG ) fortify 23,4 , mg Fe micronized ferric pyrophosphate ( MFP ) placebo solution iron drop , identical non-fortified rice ( CG ) solution iron drop . Parents instruct correct dosage iron drop fee child ( include whether much rice ) normally would . Iron status hemoglobin ( Hb ) measure baseline 5 mo .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Ultra Rice Compared Iron Drops Consumed Anemic Children
